5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

5V:229 Ending Notes …kaṇḍucchādi, vassikā sugatena cāti*. antepurañca uggaṇhe,
anāpucchā pavesane;
sūcigharañca mañcañca,
tūlonaddhaṃ nisīdanaṃ;
kaṇḍuvassikasāṭikaṃ,
pamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayīti.

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

anāpucchā pavesane;
sūcigharañca mañcañca,
tūlonaddhaṃ nisīdanaṃ;
kaṇḍuvassikasāṭikaṃ,
pamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayīti.

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

tūlonaddhaṃ nisīdanaṃ;

5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

3V:1215 Ending Notes …phalati. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ*. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, suttakena… sī.
* syā1-3. pā1. potthakesu natthi
3V:1215 Ending Notes …Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ*. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, suttakena… sī.
* syā1-3. pā1. potthakesu natthi
5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

tūlonaddhaṃ nisīdanaṃ;

pamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayīti.

anāpucchā pavesane;

tūlonaddhaṃ nisīdanaṃ;

pamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayīti.

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

5V:229 Ending Notes …kaṇḍucchādi, vassikā sugatena cāti*. antepurañca uggaṇhe,
anāpucchā pavesane;
sūcigharañca mañcañca,
tūlonaddhaṃ nisīdanaṃ;
kaṇḍuvassikasāṭikaṃ,
pamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayīti.

5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)

5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

5V:118 Ending Notes …vāyāpanacceko, Sāsaṅkaṃ saṃghikena cāti*. atirekañca pattañca,
ūnena bandhanena ca;
bhesajjaṃ sāṭakañceva,
kupitena achindanaṃ.
duve tantavāyā ceva,
accekacīvarena ca;
chārattaṃ vippavāsena,
attano pariṇāmanāti. (syā1-3.)

27Pe:468 Ending Notes …tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati* imāni cattāri padāni bhagavā ekena… paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
nāmarūpaṃ ca mārisa;
etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi,
katthetaṃ uparujjhati. (sī.)
